phrases.zh: Nǐ de shēngrì shì shénme shíhòu
phrases.ja: Anata no tanjōbi wa itsudesu ka

phrases.en: Let's go to a restaurant tonight
phrases.zh: Wǒmen jīn wǎn qù cānguǎn ba
phrases.es: Vamos a un restaurante esta noche

phrases.en: Let's go to the grocery store
phrases.es: Vamos a la tienda de comestibles

phrases.en: Can you go to buy food
phrases.zh: Nǐ néng qù mǎi cài ma?
phrases.ja: Tabemono o kau koto ga dekimasu ka?
Anata wa itsu-ka ni kaerimasu ka
Watashi wa ie ni iku yo

phrases.es: Volveré a casa la próxima semana
